Description:
Vendor Circumstances Require a Sale!
Light and bright, this renovated 2 bedroom ground floor security apartment maximizes living with minimum fuss.
Enjoying timber floors throughout, this sleek sensation features a casual living area, 2 double bedrooms (BIRs), a north facing stylish kitchen with induction cooktop and stainless steel oven and washing machine facilities and a stunning fully tiled bathroom. In a boutique group, this inviting retreat is the perfect starter or investment, complete with a security intercom, slim line blinds and auto gates to a carport.
Brilliantly located to shops, cafes, restaurants and transport along North Road, including Ormond station and Monash University bus.
Insights: 3/13 Ulupna Road, ORMOND VIC 3204 was last sold in 2015 and 49 other 2 bedroom unit in ORMOND have recently been sold.

Description:
Great Investment or Starter in Super Central Location
A wise investment or rewarding property debut, this tastefully updated first floor 2 bedroom security apartment offers high scale liveability in a superb heartland location just moments from Ormond shops and Railway Station (Monash Caulfield and Melbourne University), E.E. Gunn Reserve and bus to Monash Clayton.
Set to the rear in a small group of only 7 a formal entrance hall introduces a large renovated eat-in separate kitchen with granite benches and quality stainless steel appliances (including dishwasher), generous living room with large garden windows, Rinnai gas heating and contemporary timber floors, robed bedrooms, stylishly renovated bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles, separate toilet, laundry facilities, intercom entry, undercover car-space.
* Currently leased out at $360 per week/$1,564.00 per calendar month until 14/9/2015 *
Insights: 6/60 Ulupna Road, ORMOND VIC 3204 was last sold in 2015 and 49 other 2 bedroom unit in ORMOND have recently been sold.

Description:
AUCTION THIS SATURDAY!
A wonderfully wide street frontage and classical, charismatic Californian lines create great first impressions for this engaging three bedroom family home thats rich in period appeal and perhaps even richer in further potential. Ornate ceilings, fretwork and polished floors evoke the elegance of the era as a central hall introduces traditional spaces including separate living and dining rooms and three double bedrooms sharing a previously updated bathroom. A sky lit slate kitchen/meals area completes an interior that flows to extensive garden surroundings, including a free-standing studio/office and ample off street parking. Capture a classic, pursue a contemporary renovation, STCA, and reap significant lifestyle rewards with Gunn Reserve at the end of the street, Ormond station around the corner and several schools close by. Land: 718 sqm approx.
Insights: 11 Newham Grove, ORMOND VIC 3204 was last sold in 2017 and 29 other 3 bedroom house in ORMOND have recently been sold.

Description:
Contemporary Class In The Heart Of The Zone
Beyond a picture-perfect weatherboard facade, this magnificent low maintenance, stylishly designed 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home offers beautifully bright interiors, lovely private garden spaces and superb lifestyle advantages. Brimful of natural light with high ceilings to create a sense of space, its warmly welcoming interior reveals a stunning north-lit lounge and dining domain flowing through to a well-equipped modern kitchen with ample storage and bench space. A generous family/meals area opens out to a delightful courtyard and covered deck ideal for all-seasons alfresco dining and entertaining. Comprehensively appointed for a modern living with ducted heating, AC, and secure off street parking, situated in the highly regarded McKinnon Secondary Zone moments to McKinnon & North Rd shops, cafes & trains.

Description:
Captivating Charm With Modern Living In The Zone
A sought after location, fusion of period (circa 1928) and contemporary style and fabulous alfresco spaces create a brilliant backdrop for single level living in this 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom home. Sophisticated and impeccably presented throughout, a lounge/dining domain with gas fire, opens out via French doors to a landscaped decked courtyard, whilst a premium stone kitchen and large study/family room enhance spacious proportions. High ornate ceilings, leadlight windows, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, shed, manicured front garden and off street parking add further attraction to first home buyers, downsizers and investors. Located within the highly sort after McKinnon Secondary zone, just moments from Ormond station, Ormond Primary, parks and shops.

Description:
Contemporary Style In Stunning Garden Surrounds
Outstanding spaces in a super-convenient location, this beautifully renovated residence set behind a secure gated entry is an exciting opportunity to enjoy modern comforts and beautiful garden entertaining options in a central position within the McKinnon Primary zone where you can stroll to Ormond station, shops, JT Packer Park and St Patrick's Primary. Boasting an attractive setting where manicured established garden spaces and superb outdoor entertaining deck surround a light filled single level floorplan, this is an outstanding opportunity to step into instant comfort and style. 3 robed bedrooms, study/4th bedroom and a luxe fully tiled bathroom provide engaging accommodation, complemented by a formal lounge with gas log fireplace and relaxed family/meals zone served by a stone kitchen with Bosch appliances and soft close cabinetry. Ducted heating and refrigerated AC, timber floors, intercom, water tank and single garage conclude the total comfort of this ideal abode.

Description:
Decked Out in Courtyard Bliss
Escape to a beautiful garden courtyard retreat with this renovated 1 bedroom ground floor security apartment.
Blissful with its leafy wonderment of established trees creating a canopy of greenery over the pergola, this tranquil haven enjoys a deep north facing deck in the pebbled garden, polished boards in the casual living & dining area, modern cottage kitchen, a double bedroom (robes) and a radiant ensuite.
Lap up the outdoor lifestyle with style, as this idyllic first home, downsizer or investment is complete with panel heating, security intercom, communal laundry and auto gates to a carport.
Opposite Kilvington Grammar in this quiet pocket, excitingly close to North Road shops, cafes and transport with Monash Uni bus and the city train, walk to parkland.

Description:
A Chic Retreat with Courtyard Envy
Designed for relaxed living with indoor outdoor appeal, this stylish ground floor 2 bedroom security apartment is a fabulous find with its generous garden courtyard.
Neatly maintained, this easy care haven has a northern aspect and features security entry, a long hallway, 2 large bedrooms (BIRs), sun filled living & dining area that opens to the covered patio and private courtyard; vogue kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher & a sparkling white bathroom with laundry taps. Dressed with timber floors, this ideal first home or investment features intercom entry, a split system air conditioner & auto gates to a carport.
A casual stroll to Packer Park, North Road shops, cafes and restaurants, Monash Uni bus, and the Frankston line train, it really is apartment living with everything.

Description:
Stylish, sunlit and secure
Built around a central courtyard, this sophisticated complex has three levels of apartments with secure basement car parking, storage lockers, and lift access to all floors. This 1st floor apartment - ideal for owner-occupiers or investors - is packed with desirable features such as abundant natural light and space, a neutral decor, and low maintenance liveability. The entrance hall opens out to a living room (with split-system A/C) that includes a well finished kitchen with smooth cooktop, glass splashbacks, stone benchtops, and glossy cabinetry. A private, full width balcony has a leafy outlook. There are 2 bedrooms with mirror-fronted BIRs, and a Euro laundry. This property is close to Ormond shops, cafes, trains and buses, near schools, reserves and recreation and has easy access to Monash Uni Caulfield.
Jack Slater : 0430 283 724

Description:
***UNDER OFFER*** 'Grosvenor Lodge'- ground floor entry to the market!
Start, invest, maybe even downsize ...get in at the ground floor in this fast developing precinct of quality family homes and prestige apartment groups. Just one block from the station, bus and shops in this leafy, transport and retail precinct, this apartment offers a sized up single bedroom floor plan featuring a sunny panel heated lounge, a large robe fitted bedroom and a big bright bathroom - all opening off a generous entry lobby.
Sized up with a large eat in kitchen, laundry facilities and a carport on title, this superior single bedroom apartment is styled with fresh paintwork, new timber look flooring and venetians, frameless screening and designer fittings for the bathroom!
An easy CBD commute with direct access to both Monash University's Caulfield and Clayton campuses by bus and rail, this ready to rent or enjoy apartment is the one!

Description:
A Private Sanctuary of Spacious Bliss
Enjoy a warm sense of space and light with beautiful leafy views and contemporary style in this fabulous 1 bedroom 1st floor security apartment. Breathing in its wondrous surrounds, this inviting haven features an expansive open plan living & dining area with generous wrap around balcony, sleek stone kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, a double bedroom (BIRs) with panoramic window looking out to the stars and a large porcelain tiled bathroom/laundry with marble vanity.
With room to entertain both inside and out, this idyllic apartment features R/C air conditioner, ceiling fan, security intercom to a small group of 4 apartments and basement security parking plus large storage cage. A perfect place to call home or a savvy investment, moments to North Road shops, cafes, restaurants, Monash Uni bus, Frankston train line and glorious parkland.

Description:
Garden Oasis: Art Deco on Arnott!
Devotees of 1930s architecture will appreciate the fine detailing and timeless appeal of this delightful and beautifully presented semi-detached abode. Spacious interiors ooze character, complementing contemporary style with an emphasis on creating a warm, inviting and comfortable living space that connects seamlessly to the outdoors. A fabulous timber deck overlooks a lush garden oasis. Fantastic location, trending upwards... just a few minutes walk to Ormond village and station, bus stop to Monash University, with a selection of schools and parkland nearby.
Additional features: Gas ducted heating, open fireplace, shed, cubby house, secure fencing, OSP, timber floors and high ceilings.

Description:
Sophisticated, stylish, spacious...
Effortless designer style and sophisticated presentation give this rear, ground-floor contemporary apartment a leading edge. In a striking development with the accent on relaxed urban living, the apartment has a surprising large open-plan living room (with sleek kitchen) where sunlight streams in through a wall of glass that makes the big private courtyard like another living area. The 2 double bedrooms have mirror-fronted BIRs and their own private balconies. Refinements such as lift access from the secure basement car park (with storage cage), intercom entry, split-system A/C, and Euro laundry add to the amenity and enhance the lifestyle on offer. The location is great, too - stroll to Ormond shops, cafes, businesses, trains and buses; enjoy nearby recreational facilities; be handy to schools and Monash Uni (Caulfield).

Register your interest now!
Construction to commence February 2015 and completion September 2015

Get out in front of the first-home, downsize or investment market with a transport precinct location, McKinnon College Zoning and value-added potential! Substance, Space & a Zone Address
Substance, space and a sought-after Zone address,...this one has the complete recipe for investment, first-home or downsize success. Taking premier position in a well-laid out group, this front unit offers a super-sized two bedroom floorplan featuring living/dining wrapping around to a substantial meals area beside the quality kitchen and more living in a room-sized covered deck area. Sized up with two big robe-fitted bedrooms and a stylish bathroom with separate WC, this sizeable front home is even big on potential with a second laundry area - providing scope to convert the large existing laundry as a study space!
Centrally heated with a split-system air-conditioner for living and fan-cooling for both bedrooms, this high-quality home has brand new carpets throughout, an auto-entry garage to the side and views to the broad front lawns of the group from the living zone.
Surrounded by quality homes at the gateway to the Hill precinct and on the edge of East Brighton, this is a sizeable in-Zone opportunity!

Description:
Chic style & a private courtyard
How about a modern ground-floor apartment with large glass doors opening out to a private front courtyard-style garden where there's ample space to relax or entertain in the sunshine? With the doors open it makes the living room one with the outdoors and adds to the casual peaceful ambience of a cleverly designed, low maintenance home. The kitchen - stylish with its lime-washed cabinetry, glass splashback, smooth-top hot plates, stone benchtops, and stainless steel appliances - is part of the open plan living room (rev-cyc A/C). The 2 bedrooms have BIRs - the master bedroom having its own small courtyard and dual-access to the bathroom with Euro laundry. Extras include secure basement car park and storage locker. The location is highly convenient to Ormond shops, cafes, trains, buses, reserves and recreation.
Jack Slater : 0430 283 724

Description:
In-Zone Deco Delight in Lush Garden Oasis!
Take a step into this modern classic! Divine solid brick Art Deco delight with character-filled charm & funky modern vibe. Captivating authentic features incl. high ornate ceilings, polished boards, picture rails, warm open fireplaces & old-style mega-sized bedrooms...flawlessly integrated with groovy fresh improvements like a vast roof-space storage zone, a kitchen with European stainless-steel appliances, and an open plan lounge with meals area beneath skylit cathedral ceilings & ducted heating. Fall in love with the enchanting Wisteria covered al fresco dining terrace & relax in lush resort-style tropical gardens. In-zone for McKinnon Secondary, Primary & moments from McKinnon Reserve, Village & station, this is a rare and irresistible opportunity.

Description:
So easy to let out or to live in!
Here's an apartment with attitude! Fresh, bright, and airy it is visually appealing with its smart presentation, yet pleasingly low maintenance and relaxing - just what you want for a home or investment property. Part of a tranquil complex, it has the benefit of being on the ground floor and having a delightful sunny private courtyard. There's intercom entry, timber flooring, entrance hall, living room with panel heater, separate eat-in kitchen, 2 bedrooms with BIRs, bathroom with laundry facilities, and separate toilet. An undercover car space is on title, and the location is convenient to Ormond shops, cafes, trains, buses, reserves and recreation.
It's a beauty!
Jack Slater : 0430 283 724
